text:
Adele Fulirno is the majordomo for [[Fairhold]], the royal castle of [[Fairhaven]], [[Aundair]]. Any who seek an audience with nobility or royal advisors must first meet with Fulirno. The castellan once acted as an agent for
the [[Royal Eyes]] of [[Aundair]], but she tired of leaving
the country she loved behind. A serious and polite
woman, Fulirno knows the queen well and knows
when to send matters before [[Aurala|Aurala ir'Wynarn]] or others in the
court.
title: Adele Fulirno
